## A Plot

Let's plot $f(x)=x^2$ over $[-1,1]$.

::: {.panel-tabset}

## Plot

```{julia}

#| echo: false
#| label: fig-x-sqaured
#| fig-cap: "Plot of $y=x^2$ over $[-1,1]$"

x = -1.0:0.01:1.0;
y = x.^2;
plot(x,y,legend=false,xlab="x",ylab="y",lw=2,title=L"Plot of $y=x^2$.")

```

## Code

```{julia}

#| eval: false
#| code-fold: false

x = -1.0:0.01:1.0;
y = x.^2;
plot(x,y,legend=false,xlab="x",ylab="y",lw=2,,title=L"Plot of $y=x^2$.")

```

:::

@fig-x-sqaured shows the result.
